Articles.Content:
Liking these parts a lot. I saw that the orbital orb mentioned including a lot of storage space so I whipped up a quick module manager config to add 60 KAS storage space to it! Hopefully this will save someone 3 minutes of work 


@PART[orbitalorb]
{
	MODULE
	{
	name = KASModuleContainer
	maxSize = 60
	}
}

Sorry for double post, can't edit post.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/wayland-corp-space-station-o-ring-truss-pack/

That's the station part kiwiak asked for.

Thatnks a lot for that, i will check it out!

I know the inflating hab. module is for space stations, but could you make parts be radially attachable on the main body(and add a tweakable that lets us begin flights with the part inflated) so we can make it a ground base part? Its interior is just superior to the Hitchhiker Storage Module.

very lovly work ! downloading right now. the parts, espacily the centrifuge, are perfect for my realistic deep space exploration project AND they look stook-like. let's see, how they will look together with Nertea's "Near Future Propulsion pack" or maybe some shiny nukeenignes from Kommitz? we will see ...

thanks a lot for your work !

That is what i had in mind as well. The habitat pack is just what i needed

Construction has already begun

Well done, very nice parts. Thank you!
I can't download it. I'm getting a message saying the page is not available.

Liking these parts a lot. I saw that the orbital orb mentioned including a lot of storage space so I whipped up a quick module manager config to add 60 KAS storage space to it! Hopefully this will save someone 3 minutes of work 


@PART[orbitalorb]
{
	MODULE
	{
	name = KASModuleContainer
	maxSize = 60
	}
}

Thats a really good idea! Maybe ill edit some other parts to be containers... I think parts from the LLL pack are suited for that.

Omg. That is BIG

Naaah not THAT big... Why, a Kerbal was able to EVA the length of it in just a few minutes!
It's fantastic you went the extra mile with the interior:)

Just got Habitat in Orbit and tested my new SSTO Kerbal Bus ability to dock it

I'm going to dock a Duna lander module to the front and a huge fuel tank and FTmN engine module to the rear and that's my interplanetary ship complete. Also has a lab and a mirror telescope

Got it up there in one lump with this

Thanks again for Habitat Mod

Edited January 10, 2014 by LMA
Would you mind putting a version number in the thread title? It'd be good to know when updates are released.

Just got Habitat in Orbit and tested my new SSTO Kerbal Bus ability to dock it

I'm going to dock a Duna lander module to the front and a huge fuel tank and FTmN engine module to the rear and that's my interplanetary ship complete. Also has a lab and a mirror telescope

http://imageshack.com/a/img585/5671/wjmr.jpg

Got it up there in one lump with this

http://imageshack.com/a/img28/6587/hiom.jpg

Thanks again for Habitat Mod

That fairing looks in comparison to the rocket very odd

Yea no idea what was going on inside it but I'm amazed it didn't snap in half from the zig zagging to orbit. Using Ferram Aerospace mod it gives less air drag for the correct shape and worse drag for bad shapes so fairings are very important for big wonky sticky out payloads

Edited January 10, 2014 by LMA

Very nice mod so far, but if I may, and I hate to be "that guy", could you please capitalize the action labels in the right click menus (eg. "inflate", "rotate", etc)? As a perfectionist, it just irritates me somewhat.
Mediafire is a pain... But this mod looks amazing.

Awesome science outpost, and that rocket... that fairing... just so Kerbal.

Thanks

I use Drop Box for sharing synthesizer presets it's very easy and fast and it's what others prefair on the music forums. Drop Box is free upto 2GB space. Noticed a few others on here use it, its becoming more popular for file sharing. https://www.dropbox.com/

To whom it may concern:

I've just released RasterPropMonitor v0.13, which includes a ModuleManager patch that populates TMA-1 Orbital Orb IVA with RPM-based instruments, which will surely tide you over until Porkjet does a better one.
Thanks so does Raster show up inside the habitat pod?

Thanks so does Raster show up inside the habitat pod?

Habitat - no. Only TMA-1 orbital orb. There simply isn't anything in the habitat pod that is appropriately a control panel of any sort.
I'd use the heck out of that PA550 inflatable habitat if the bottom attachment point was a 2.5m - awkward turning it back into a 2.5m with an adapter + struts.

I'm having trouble using the orb with the rpm's, when I put it on the launchpad there are no crew portraits, along with other graphical glitches with the UI
